data.title: Joe Jonas Is 'Excited And Emotional' While Confirming New Solo Music
data.meta_description: Joe Jonas has new music coming sooner than you think!
data.text:
Joe Jonas officially has new music on the way!

The Jonas Brothers star took to social media on Wednesday (July 10) to confirm that he has new solo music coming as soon as next week, starting with the song "Work It Out." He announced the exciting news in a video featuring a stunning backdrop with a message overlayed expressing his gratitude for the collaborations he experienced while making the new songs.

"I'm both excited and emotional as I'm gearing up to release new music," he wrote. "I'm humbled and grateful to collaborate with some of my favorite musicians & creators. I hope you find as much happiness & peace as I do when you listen to these songs."

The Camp Rock star has only put out one solo album, 2011's Fastlife, but he teased new music earlier this year, singing how he was "feeling so miserable" amid his divorce from Sophie Turner. and that "even baddies get saddies and that's the hardest truth."

"Work it Out" drops Friday, July 19.
